CustomField.formula: TEXT( YEAR( $Setup.Law_Firm_Sales_Summary_Report__c.Start_Date__c ) ) & "-" & IF( MONTH( $Setup.Law_Firm_Sales_Summary_Report__c.Start_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "" ) & TEXT( MONTH( $Setup.Law_Firm_Sales_Summary_Report__c.Start_Date__c ) ) & "-" & IF( DAY( $Setup.Law_Firm_Sales_Summary_Report__c.Start_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "") & TEXT( DAY( $Setup.Law_Firm_Sales_Summary_Report__c.Start_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: Conga LawFirmSale Summary Rpt Start Date
